name: ModernizeBot
description: Quarterly code modernization agent that identifies outdated APIs and suggests modern alternatives

trigger.description: Runs quarterly (Jan 1, Apr 1, Jul 1, Oct 1) at 11:00 AM UTC

prompt.template:
Scan the codebase for outdated patterns and APIs that can be modernized:
- Deprecated Node.js APIs
- Legacy React patterns (class components, deprecated lifecycle methods)
- Outdated package versions with breaking changes
- Callback hell vs async/await
- var/function vs const/arrow functions
- Manual DOM manipulation vs declarative patterns

Generate a modernization roadmap with priority levels and migration effort estimates.
